job_description:
Senior/ Lead Full Stack Rails Developer

The Company

Our partner has been the leading commercial real estate listing platform in Canada. Their business is a listing platform designed to help discover incredible spaces and make smart decisions about where to start or expand a business. Their objective is make it easy, transparent, and fun to search for space by providing complete, rich and accurate information.

They are looking for a Senior/ Lead Full Stack Developer and the focus is on core feature development (primarily backend), data management/integrations, API development, platform optimizations, project planning/strategy, devops (heroku) and perform peer code reviews.

Qualifications & Skills

5+ years as a senior developer (leadership experience a plus)
Experience with databases: Postgres, ElasticSearch (Algolia a plus)
Very Strong programming experience with Ruby on Rails
Experience with Heroku, AWS, S3 and REST APIs
Experience developing and consuming APIs (REST, OAuth, AWS, etc)
Strong experience in frontend web technologies including HTML5, SCSS, CoffeeScript.
Experience with Github and Jira

The Ideal Candidate

Passionate about use cases and solving problems that people care about.
Understand business models and enjoy codifying them.
Detail oriented and analytical with good sense of logic.
A strong team player but a total self-starter.
Thrive in a multitasking environment and can adjust priorities on-the-fly.
Driven, passionate and hardworking.
Egoless and willing to help out where needed.

Benefits & Perks

Excellent benefits package (including Dental)
3+ weeks paid vacation
Flexibility to work remotely anywhere in Canada
